Type of contract: Goods and Related Services
Type of notice: Invitation for tenders

This Invitation for tenders follows the General Procurement Notice for this project which was published on the EBRD website, Procurement Notices (www.ebrd.com) on 22.9.2017 (procurement ref.: 8381-GPN-44753).

Khujand Water Company (Khujandvodokanal) hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends to use part of the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) towards the cost of Khujand Water Supply Improvement Programme (Phase III).
The purchaser now invites sealed tenders from suppliers for the following contracts to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loan:
Tender Package Nº 7: Operation and maintenance equipment and machinery:
Lot 3 Dump Truck (medium load capacity) for loading and unloading 1,
Tenders are invited for one or more lots. Each lot must be priced separately. Tenders for more than one lot may offer discounts and such discounts will be considered in the comparison of tenders.
Tendering for contracts that are to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Bank is open to firms from any country.
To be qualified for the award of a contract, tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:
1. The tenderer is duly authorised to supply the goods in the purchaser’s country;
2. The audited balance sheets for the last 3 years (2014-2016) shall demonstrate the soundness of the Tenderer’s financial position, showing long-term profitability.

3. The tenderer has the financial, technical and production capability and capacity necessary to perform the contract. Average annual turnover over the last 3 years(2014-2016) should not be less than:

4. The tenderer must demonstrate access to, or availability of, financial resources such as liquid assets, unencumbered real assets, lines of credit, and other financial means, other than any contractual advance payments to meet the cash flow requirements which are

5. The tenderer has experience as supplier, in at least 2 contracts within the last 5 years (2013-2017) that have been successfully and substantially completed and that are similar to the proposed goods each with a value of at least 80 % of tender price.
Joint venture including consortium must satisfy the following requirements:

a) The lead partner meets at least 70 % of the criteria for average annual turnover and available cash flow while each other partner shall meet at least 30 % of the criteria for average annual turnover and available cash flow.
b) The joint venture must satisfy collectively and fully all qualification criteria
Tenderer willing to submit tenders for more than one lot shall meet the cumulative requirements for lots they apply to, as described in the tender documents.

The tender documents will be issued in hard copy upon showing the bank invoice as confirmation of payment done by tenderer for receiving tender package. The tender package costs USD 100. The payment should be done in TJS with using the exchange rate on the date of payment. The Khujandvodokanal Bank account details for payment are as below:
Beneficiary: State Communal Unitary Enterprise Khujandvodokanal (Tax ID 510001819)
Bank details for payment in US Dollars:
Beneficiary Bank: State Saving Bank of Tajikistan “AMONATBONK”, Khujand branch
Bank details for payment in Tajik SomoniI:
Beneficiary Bank: State Saving Bank of Tajikistan “AMONATBONK”, Khujand branch

Upon receiving appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee, the documents will be promptly dispatched by electronically through email as PDF format. No hard copy will be sent. If tenderer prefer to have hard copy, him/her can collect it from Khujandvodokanal office, which address showed below. In the event of discrepancy between electronic and hard copies of the documents, the hard copy shall prevail.

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before 15:00 local time on 20.3.2018 at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend:
State Committee on Investment and State Property Management
